faqs.question: What is AJ Creations?
faqs.answer: AJ Creations is a lifestyle and boutique store based in Noida that offers women's clothing, cosmetics, candles, soaps, and decorative home products.

faqs.question: Where is AJ Creations located?
faqs.answer: AJ Creations is located at Office No. 1125, Tower A, A40, Sector 62, Noida, Uttar Pradesh - 201309.

faqs.question: What are the store hours?
faqs.answer: The store operates from Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM.

faqs.question: How can I shop from AJ Creations?
faqs.answer: You can shop in-store or online at www.ajcreations.in. Browse through categories, add products to your cart, and proceed to checkout securely.

faqs.question: Which payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: AJ Creations accepts UPI, Credit/Debit Cards, Wallet Payments, Net Banking, and Cash on Delivery.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, a Tracking ID will be shared via SMS and email. You can track it at www.ajcreations.in/track-order.

faqs.question: How do I care for AJ Creations clothing?
faqs.answer: Hand wash or use a gentle cycle with mild detergent. Avoid direct sunlight for drying.

faqs.question: How should I store candles and soaps?
faqs.answer: Keep candles away from drafts and trim wicks before lighting. Store soaps in a dry place and avoid leaving them in water.

faqs.question: What is the AJ Rewards Program?
faqs.answer: AJ Rewards is a loyalty program where you earn 1 point for every ₹100 spent. Points can be redeemed for discounts, gifts, and early access to sales.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach AJ Creations via email at support@ajcreations.in, by phone at +91-9876543210, or through 24/7 live chat on the website.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations offer Cash on Delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, Cash on Delivery (COD) is available on select orders.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be cancelled within 12 hours of placement, provided they haven’t been shipped yet.

faqs.question: How can I return a product?
faqs.answer: Products can be returned within 7 days of delivery if unused and in original packaging. Some categories like cosmetics are non-returnable for hygiene reasons.

faqs.question: How do I join the AJ Rewards program?
faqs.answer: You can sign up for free at www.ajcreations.in/rewards to start earning points and exclusive benefits.

faqs.question: Where can I send feedback or suggestions?
faqs.answer: Send your feedback to feedback@ajcreations.in. The AJ Creations team values customer input for continuous improvement.

faqs.question: What types of products does AJ Creations sell?
faqs.answer: AJ Creations sells women's fashion apparel, organic cosmetics, handcrafted candles, herbal soaps, and home décor items.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations deliver across India?
faqs.answer: Yes, AJ Creations offers nationwide delivery. Free shipping is available for orders above ₹999.

faqs.question: Is customer data safe while shopping online?
faqs.answer: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and processed through secure, RBI-compliant gateways to protect customer data.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Orders are usually shipped within 2–3 business days and delivered within 3–7 days depending on the location.

faqs.question: What is the best way to clean decor items?
faqs.answer: Wipe gently with a dry or soft damp cloth. Avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive materials.

faqs.question: What courier partners does AJ Creations use?
faqs.answer: We work with leading courier services such as Bluedart, Delhivery, and India Post for reliable delivery.

faqs.question: How can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your order within 12 hours of placement before it has been shipped.

faqs.question: What is the return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return products within 7 days of delivery if unused and in original packaging. Some products like cosmetics are non-returnable.

faqs.question: How do I initiate a return?
faqs.answer: Go to your order history on the website, select the order, and click 'Request Return'.

faqs.question: How long does it take to get a refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 working days after we receive and verify the returned product.

faqs.question: Are there any non-returnable items?
faqs.answer: Yes, cosmetics, personal hygiene items, and used products cannot be returned for safety reasons.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only deliver within India. International shipping will be available soon.

faqs.question: Is my personal data safe on the website?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use secure SSL encryption and follow RBI-compliant payment processing standards.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations store payment details?
faqs.answer: No, we do not store your card or UPI information. All transactions are processed through secure payment gateways.

faqs.question: Can I modify my delivery address after placing an order?
faqs.answer: Address changes are allowed within 6 hours of placing the order, provided the item hasn’t been shipped.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer eco-friendly gift wrapping for an additional ₹49 per item.

faqs.question: How can I care for AJ Creations clothing?
faqs.answer: Use mild detergent, hand wash or gentle machine wash, and avoid direct sunlight for drying.

faqs.question: How should I store candles?
faqs.answer: Keep candles away from fans and drafts, and always trim the wick before lighting.

faqs.question: How should I store soaps?
faqs.answer: Store soaps in a dry place and avoid leaving them in water after use.

faqs.question: Are AJ Creations products handmade?
faqs.answer: Many of our candles, soaps, and decor items are handcrafted by skilled local artisans.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations offer eco-friendly products?
faqs.answer: Yes, most of our products are made with sustainable materials and eco-friendly packaging.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact us via email at support@ajcreations.in, phone at +91-9876543210, or live chat on our website.

faqs.question: What is the AJ Rewards Program?
faqs.answer: It’s a loyalty program where customers earn points on every purchase and can redeem them for discounts and gifts.

faqs.question: How can I join the AJ Rewards Program?
faqs.answer: Sign up for free at www.ajcreations.in/rewards to start earning points.

faqs.question: Can I use multiple coupons on one order?
faqs.answer: No, only one promotional coupon or discount code can be applied per order.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations have seasonal sales?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer special discounts during festive seasons, end-of-year sales, and exclusive online events.

faqs.question: How do I clean decor items?
faqs.answer: Wipe them with a soft, dry or slightly damp cloth. Avoid using chemicals or water directly.

faqs.question: Can I get updates on new collections?
faqs.answer: Yes, subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on Instagram and Facebook for new arrivals and offers.

faqs.question: Where can I share feedback or suggestions?
faqs.answer: You can email us at feedback@ajcreations.in — we value customer input and continuously improve our offerings.

faqs.question: Does AJ Creations have a wholesale program?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer bulk order and wholesale options for selected product categories. Contact us via business@ajcreations.in.

faqs.question: Are AJ Creations products cruelty-free?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our cosmetics and skincare products are cruelty-free and not tested on animals.

faqs.question: Do you offer personalized gifts or customization?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer product personalization for candles, hampers, and decor items on request.

note: This FAQ dataset is created for RAG-based AI chatbot integration and includes sample responses for customer assistance.
